verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar מִקְטַ֣ר <WH4729> to burn קְטֹ֑רֶת <WH7004> incense עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <WH7848> upon [of] shittim תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

אַמָּ֨ה <WH520> A cubit אָרְכּ֜וֹ <WH753> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit רָחְבּוֹ֙ <WH7341> the breadth רָב֣וּעַ <WH7251> thereof foursquare יִהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> two וְאַמָּתַ֖יִם <WH520> shall it be and two cubits קֹמָת֑וֹ <WH6967> [shall be] the height מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at קַרְנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7161> thereof the horns

וְצִפִּיתָ֨ <WH6823> And thou shalt overlay אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֗וֹר <WH2889> it with pure אֶת־ <WH853> גַּגּ֧וֹ <WH1406> the top וְאֶת־ <WH853> קִירֹתָ֛יו <WH7023> thereof and the sides סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> thereof round about וְאֶת־ <WH853> קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <WH7161> and the horns וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> thereof and thou shalt make לּ֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <WH2213> unto it a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וּשְׁתֵּי֩ <WH8147> And two טַבְּעֹ֨ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֜ב <WH2091> golden תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> shalt thou make לּ֣וֹ ׀ מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under לְזֵר֗וֹ <WH2213> to it under the crown עַ֚ל <WH5921> and שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> of it by the two צַלְעֹתָ֔יו <WH6763> corners תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> of it shalt thou make עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> thereof upon the two צִדָּ֑יו <WH6654> sides וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall be for לְבָתִּ֣ים <WH1004> [it] and they shall be for places לְבַדִּ֔ים <WH905> for the staves לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> to bear אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בָּהֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> it withal

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> them with gold

וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> And thou shalt put אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> it before הַפָּרֹ֔כֶת <WH6532> the vail אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is עַל־ <WH5921> near אֲרֹ֣ן <WH727> that [is] by the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> of the testimony לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> is עַל־ <WH5921> over הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> that [is] over the testimony אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <WH3259> where I will meet לְךָ֖ שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

וְהִקְטִ֥יר <WH6999> shall burn עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> And Aaron קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> incense סַמִּ֑ים <WH5561> thereon sweet בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> every morning בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> morning בְּהֵיטִיב֛וֹ <WH3190> when he dresseth אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּרֹ֖ת <WH5216> the lamps יַקְטִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH6999> he shall burn incense

וּבְהַעֲלֹ֨ת <WH5927> lighteth אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> And when Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּרֹ֛ת <WH5216> the lamps בֵּ֥ין <WH996> at הָעֲרְבַּ֖יִם <WH6153> at even יַקְטִירֶ֑נָּה <WH6999> he shall burn incense קְטֹ֧רֶת <WH7004> incense תָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> upon it a perpetual לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout your generations

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> Ye shall offer עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and קְטֹ֥רֶת <WH7004> incense זָרָ֖ה <WH2114> no strange וְעֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> thereon nor burnt sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> nor meat offering וְנֵ֕סֶךְ <WH5262> drink offering לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִסְּכ֖וּ <WH5258> neither shall ye pour עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וְכִפֶּ֤ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And Aaron עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנֹתָ֔יו <WH7161> upon the horns אַחַ֖ת <WH259> of it once בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> in a year מִדַּ֞ם <WH1818> with the blood חַטַּ֣את <WH2403> of the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִ֗ים <WH3725> of atonements אַחַ֤ת <WH259> once בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> in the year יְכַפֵּ֤ר <WH3722> shall he make atonement עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> upon it throughout your generations קֹֽדֶשׁ־ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <WH6944> holy ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תִשָּׂ֞א <WH5375> When thou takest אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> the sum בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם֒ <WH6485> after their number וְנָ֨תְנ֜וּ <WH5414> then shall they give אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man כֹּ֧פֶר <WH3724> a ransom נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> for his soul לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> when thou numberest אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בָהֶ֛ם נֶ֖גֶף <WH5063> them that there be no plague בִּפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> among them when [thou] numberest אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> This יִתְּנ֗וּ <WH5414> This they shall give כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הָעֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> every one that passeth עַל־ <WH5921> among הַפְּקֻדִ֔ים <WH6485> them that are numbered מַחֲצִ֥ית <WH4276> half הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> a shekel בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> [is] twenty גֵּרָה֙ <WH1626> gerah הַשֶּׁ֔קֶל <WH8255> (a shekel מַחֲצִ֣ית <WH4276> half הַשֶּׁ֔קֶל <WH8255> shekel תְּרוּמָ֖ה <WH8641> [shall be] the offering לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> Everyone הָעֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> Every one that passeth עַל־ <WH5921> and הַפְּקֻדִ֔ים <WH6485> among them that are numbered מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and above יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> shall give תְּרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> an offering יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

הֶֽעָשִׁ֣יר <WH6223> The rich לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יַרְבֶּ֗ה <WH7235> shall not give more וְהַדַּל֙ <WH1800> and the poor לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יַמְעִ֔יט <WH4591> shall not give less מִֽמַּחֲצִ֖ית <WH4276> than half הַשָּׁ֑קֶל <WH8255> a shekel לָתֵת֙ <WH5414> when [they] give אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> an offering יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> for your souls

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> money הַכִּפֻּרִ֗ים <WH3722> to make an atonement מֵאֵת֙ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְנָתַתָּ֣ <WH5414> and shalt appoint אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> for עֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> it for the service אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> that it may be a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> for your souls פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> Thou shalt also make כִּיּ֥וֹר <WH3595> a laver נְחֹ֛שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass וְכַנּ֥וֹ <WH3653> and his foot נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> [also of] brass לְרָחְצָ֑ה <WH7364> to wash וְנָתַתָּ֣ <WH5414> [withal] and thou shalt put אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> it between the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> and thou shalt put שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וְרָחֲצ֛וּ <WH7364> shall wash אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> For Aaron וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7272> and their feet

בְּבֹאָ֞ם <WH935> When they go אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֧הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> of the congregation יִרְחֲצוּ־ <WH7364> they shall wash מַ֖יִם <WH4325> with water וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> that they die א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְגִשְׁתָּ֤ם <WH5066> not or when they come near אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> to the altar לְשָׁרֵ֔ת <WH8334> to minister לְהַקְטִ֥יר <WH6999> to burn offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְרָחֲצ֛וּ <WH7364> So they shall wash יְדֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3027> their hands וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> and their feet וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> that they die וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֧ם חָק־ <WH2706> not and it shall be a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <WH5769> for ever ל֥וֹ וּלְזַרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> to them [even] to him and to his seed לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout their generations פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you קַח־ <WH3947> Take לְךָ֮ בְּשָׂמִ֣ים <WH1314> spices רֹאשׁ֒ <WH7218> thou also unto thee principal מָר־ <WH4753> myrrh דְּרוֹר֙ <WH1865> of pure חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> five מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְקִנְּמָן־ <WH7076> cinnamon בֶּ֥שֶׂם <WH1314> [shekels] and of sweet מַחֲצִית֖וֹ <WH4276> half חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <WH3967> [even] two hundred וּקְנֵה־ <WH7070> calamus בֹ֖שֶׂם <WH1314> [shekels] and of sweet חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> two hundred

וְקִדָּ֕ה <WH6916> And of cassia חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> [shekels] after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְשֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> and of oil זַ֖יִת <WH2132> olive הִֽין׃ <WH1969> an hin

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> שֶׁ֚מֶן <WH8081> it an oil מִשְׁחַת־ <WH4888> ointment קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of holy רֹ֥קַח <WH7545> an ointment מִרְקַ֖חַת <WH4842> compound מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> after the art רֹקֵ֑חַ <WH7543> of the apothecary שֶׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> oil מִשְׁחַת־ <WH4888> anointing קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> it shall be an holy יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> And thou shalt anoint ב֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> therewith and the ark הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> of the testimony

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <WH7979> And the table וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> and all his vessels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> and the candlestick וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלֶ֑יהָ <WH3627> and his vessels וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> and the altar הַקְּטֹֽרֶת׃ <WH7004> of incense

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> And the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> with all his vessels וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <WH3595> and the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּנּֽוֹ׃ <WH3653> and his foot

וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֣ <WH6942> And thou shalt sanctify אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> become קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> them that they may be most קָֽדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy כָּל־ <WH3605> whatever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> whatsoever toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <WH6942> them shall be holy

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons תִּמְשָׁ֑ח <WH4886> And thou shalt anoint וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH6942> and consecrate אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְכַהֵ֥ן <WH3547> them that [they] may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying שֶׁ֠מֶן <WH8081> oil מִשְׁחַת־ <WH4888> anointing קֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH6944> This shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become זֶ֛ה <WH2088> This לִ֖י לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> unto me throughout your generations

עַל־ <WH5921> and בְּשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> flesh אָדָם֙ <WH120> Upon man's לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִיסָ֔ךְ <WH3251> shall it not be poured וּבְמַ֨תְכֻּנְתּ֔וֹ <WH4971> [any other] like it after the composition לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> neither shall ye make כָּמֹ֑הוּ <WH3644> like קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> of it it [is] holy ה֔וּא <WH1931> he קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [and] it shall be holy יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶֽם׃
